Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: Absolutely amazing! The place is cozy, the staff are super friendly and the drinks are not like any other place in Amsterdam.. 5 stars!

Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: The best homemade liquors in Amsterdam. A quiet, genuine place to chill and drink and enjoy!

Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: The bartender is a very nice person that helps you feel welcomed right after you enter. The beer selection is pretty good in my experience and the wood tables and vintage decor helps sell this place as a must-go. And a must-return for me. C=

Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: Had the greatest of times. The Bar had a great atmosphere and a very fulfilling array of beers for everyone's tastes. The service was the best I've seen in a while, Tim was as funny as he was efficient, if every bar had a bartender this …

Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: Really wonderful hidden gem. It's a "proeflokal" meaning a place to taste and try things. Het Kelkje is the proeflokal of a local Amsterdam distillery that makes all kinds of tasty spirits. To accompany all their house made spirits they're also specialized with a nice selection of German and Czech beers.

Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: Hidden gem! Fantastic selection of liqueurs, genever, beer -  accompanied by great staff. Easily 10/10. Take your time here and enjoy.

Name: Proeflokaal 't Kelkje
Review Text: Great little gem in the centre of Amsterdam. A very local spot with a huge selection of jenevers and beers. Very friendly bar staff.

Review Text: Nice and quiet in a somewhat busy street, always some nice craft beer
